Name: Join Rush Attack / 加入突袭
About the game: Welcome in Join Rush Attack! Start running alone and gather people on your way to collect a massive crowd. Calculate your moves on the run and save as many members of the crowd as possible. Let’s see how far you can get in this crazy survival race! Run the crowd until you reach the castle at the end of the level. Crush your rivals in the final battle and capture the fortress! Game Features: - A ton of levels - Customize your character as you want - Educational game, perfect for kids! What are you waiting for? Grab the game right now!!!
